attributes.action: Increase the contribution level that MPs pay for final salary pensions .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When government is constantly telling us , the working public that we must save more and more for our old age, why is it that your MP only has to contribute a pawltry £6000 per annun to qualify for a final pension of £40,000 !! For us , the tax payer, would have to contribute over £21,000 per annum to acheive the same in a private scheme. I understand 30% of our council tax bills go towards these payments !! Give us a tax break and allow us some of the privalges that  you, the government enjoy so freely !

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
